sourcesContent:
<template>
  <router-view></router-view>
</template>

<script setup>
// 错误捕获 ———— 忽略错误，不记录进日志
const e = window.error;
window.onerror = function (
  errorMessage,
  scriptURI,
  lineNumber,
  columnNumber,
  error
) {
  if (errorMessage === "ResizeObserver loop limit exceeded") {
    console.warn(errorMessage);
    return true;
  } else {
    return e(...arguments);
  }
};
</script>

<style></style>
